commands.fastback.help.subcommands:
Available subcommands:
%s
For detailed help on a subcommand, run
/backup help [subcommand]
or go to https://pcal43.github.io/fastback
commands.fastback.help.enable: Enable local backups backups on this world.
commands.fastback.help.create-remote: Create a remote backup target on the file system.
commands.fastback.help.list: List backup snapshots for this world.
commands.fastback.help.remote: Set the url for remote backups.
commands.fastback.help.shutdown: Enable or disable backups on shutdown.
commands.fastback.help.uuid: Show the uuid for this world backup.
fastback.notify.suggest-enable: Backups are disabled. To enable, run '/backup enable'
fastback.notify.internal-error: An unexpected backup error occurred. See log for details.
fastback.notify.file-remote-created:
Git repository created at %s
Remote backups enabled to:
%s
fastback.notify.backups-enabled: Enabled automatic local backups on world shutdown.
fastback.notify.remote-no-url:
No remote URL is set.
Run '/backup remote <remote-url>'
fastback.notify.remote-how-to-enable:
Run '/backup remote enable' to enable remote backups to:
%s
fastback.notify.remote-how-to-enable-no-: Run '/backup remote <remote-url>' to enable remote backups.
fastback.shutdown.currently-enabled: Backup on world shutdown is currently enabled.
fastback.shutdown.enabled: Backup on world shutdown is now enabled.
fastback.shutdown.currently-disabled: Backup on shutdown is currently disabled.
fastback.shutdown.disabled: Backup on shutdown is now disabled.
